Package it.polimi.se2019.view

Class SelectableOptions<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.view.SelectableOptions<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the option
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class SelectableOptions<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Utility class representing selectable options. It supports:
  • A number of selectable options
  • A list of selectable options
See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SelectableOptions

        public SelectableOptions​(java.util.List<T> options,
                         int maxSelectables,
                         int minSelectables,
                         java.lang.String prompt)
        Parameters:
        options - list of options that can be chosen
        maxSelectables - max number of option to choose (if 0, it gets converted to the list size)
        minSelectables - min number of option to choose
        prompt - String to show to the client, indicating the purpose of the Options

      • SelectableOptions

        public SelectableOptions​(SelectableOptions selectableOptions)
        Creates a selectable options, copying constraints and the prompt from another selectableOptions
        Parameters:
        selectableOptions - a selectable options to copy parameters
